purpose: Support HR and leadership in conducting structured annual performance reviews with trackable employee evaluations and follow-up goals.
business_value: Ensures compliance with corporate evaluation processes
Provides leadership with data to support promotions or training plans
Allows HR to document improvement plans and actions

mvp_components.app_details: A model-driven app to manage the performance review process, including forms for self-assessment and manager input.

app_screens.screen_details: Structured form for employees to add self-assessment and for managers to submit performance reviews.

features.forms: Customizable forms for capturing self-assessment and manager input during the performance review process.
features.two_forms: One form for the employee self-assessment and another form for the manager's review to ensure structured data entry.
features.business_process_flow: A multi-step business process flow to guide users through the draft, review, and confirm stages of the performance review process.
features.views: Custom views to track review status by employee and department, and to identify overdue reviews.
features.security_roles: Different security roles to control access to the form based on user roles (e.g., employee, manager, HR).
features.workflows: Automated workflows to notify managers and HR when reviews are due or overdue, and to handle transitions between stages of the review process.
features.dashboards: Dashboards to provide leadership and HR with an overview of the performance review process, including compliance and status reports.
features.related_records: Functionality to associate individual development goals with the performance review and to link to the internal Learning Management System (LMS).
features.subgrid: A subgrid on the employee profile to display manager feedback history, linked to the performance review records.

app_screens.screen_details: Dashboard to track the status of reviews by employee and department.

features.entity_forms: Custom forms for capturing self-assessment and manager input during the performance review process.
features.views: Custom views to display the status of reviews filtered by employee and department.
features.dashboards: A dashboard that aggregates the views and charts to provide an overview of the review statuses.
features.charts: Visual representations of data to quickly identify review status distribution across departments and to highlight overdue reviews.
features.business_process_flows: Guided multi-step workflows that define the stages of the performance review process (draft, review, confirm).
features.security_roles: Role-based access control to ensure that only authorized HR personnel and leadership can access and manage the performance reviews.
features.business_rules: Automated rules to enforce business logic, such as validation of required fields and setting field values based on review status.
features.reporting_and_analytics: Built-in reporting tools to generate compliance reports indicating which employees are overdue for their performance review.

app_screens.screen_details: Power BI dashboard to report on compliance and identify overdue evaluations.

features.entity: A custom entity to store performance review records with fields for employee, department, review status, and dates for each review step.
features.form: A structured form associated with the custom entity for self-assessment and manager input.
features.workflow: A business process flow to support the multi-step review process: draft, review, and confirm.
features.view: Custom views to track review status by employee and department, including a view for overdue evaluations.
features.security_roles: Security roles to ensure appropriate access control for HR, managers, and employees.
features.powerbi_integration: Integration with Power BI to create a dashboard for reporting on compliance and identifying overdue evaluations.
features.powerbi_dashboard: A Power BI dashboard embedded within the Model-Driven App to display the compliance report.

mvp_components.flow_details: Multi-step workflow to manage the review process from draft to review to confirmation.

flow_actions.action_details: Initiates the review process allowing for draft submission.
Workflow step for manager to review and edit the performance review.
Final step for the employee to confirm the review.

post_mvp_modules.details: Add functionality to create and track individual development goals for employees post-review.
post_mvp_modules.recommendation: Extend the ModelDrivenApp with additional screens to manage development goals, as it aligns with the existing performance review process and provides a centralized location for all employee development activities.

post_mvp_modules.details: Integrate with the internal Learning Management System (LMS) to align employee development goals with available training resources.
post_mvp_modules.recommendation: Use Power Automate to create flows that synchronize data between the Performance Review App and the LMS, ensuring seamless integration and data consistency.

post_mvp_modules.details: Provide a historical view of manager feedback on employee profiles to track performance over time.
post_mvp_modules.recommendation: Add screens to the ModelDrivenApp to display historical feedback, leveraging the structured data already captured in the performance review process.

permissions: Submit and edit performance reviews for reports

constraints: Access must follow hierarchical reporting structure
Review records must be read-only after final submission
